intro.description: Full Stack Developer with experience creating web, mobile, and SaaS applications. Ensuring quality, efficiency, and ease of use in every project.

experiences.company: Club Naval de Campo las Salinas
bulletpoints: Digitalized physical records, enabling enterprise-level data availability.
Collaborated with different departments to ensure data integrity.
Improved traceability by enriching existing records with information.

experiences.company: Club Naval de Campo las Salinas
bulletpoints: Developed a mobile application, back-office web system and a database for order-taking across food outlets, updated to support dynamic network-level configuration and operation.
Conducted user training sessions, ensuring easy and trouble-free adoption.
Optimized the order-taking process, ensuring usability for users of all ages and enhancing the first system iteration.

experiences.company: Club Naval de Campo las Salinas
bulletpoints: Developed a web-based staff management platform, including budget projections and a database.
Collaborated with different departments, understanding information flow among staff.
Reduced calculation errors and improved information availability across all departments.

experiences.company: Club Naval de Campo las Salinas
bulletpoints: Developed a mobile application for taking orders across food outlets, fully offline on the device.
Resolved the issues of the previous system, improving the way orders are taken.
Developed a portfolio website for the company.
Enhanced the company’s visibility by providing information on projects carried out, increasing its customer base.

projects.name: +Lectura
projects.description: Developed a web-based book recommendation platform using Machine Learning, achieving 80% accuracy based on user behavior. It also served as a platform for sharing among users and saving reading lists.

projects.name: Album Showcase
projects.description: Music portfolio showcasing my favorite albums with song previews using Spotify embeds.

projects.name: RotMGRPC
projects.description: Discord extension for the game Realm of the Mad God, allowing players to share real-time information about their character through platform activities. The extension reached over 200 users.

footer.built_with: Built using Vue, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS and Astro.
